achievements: Scaled Bonfire’s engineering org from a single team to four, modernizing the tech stack and improving shipping cycles from 8 weeks to 2 weeks.
At Google, nearly tripled adoption of Workflows to 85k+ customers, significantly increasing usage per customer.
Co-founded Plot, a workspace app driven by agents for multi-device task management.
CTO of runQL, developing a multiplayer data explorer for collaborative data science workflows.
Extensive track record as a zero-to-one product creator, rallying teams around results-focused innovation.

education_info.degree: Bachelor of Mathematics, Computer Science with Software Engineering Option

recent_achievements: Became CTO of **runQL** (2023 – Present), focusing on multiplayer data exploration.
Founded **Plot** in 2023, exploring agent-driven productivity tools.
Helped scale **TalentLift Canada** as founding board chair, enabling 2,000+ refugees to relocate into Canadian jobs.
conversation_starters: Discuss his role in scaling **Workflows at Google** and bringing it to market.
Ask about his philosophy on empowering directly responsible individuals in product teams.
Explore his involvement with **TalentLift Canada** and using tech to connect refugees with job opportunities.
Talk about the development of **runQL** and its multiplayer approach to data exploration.
notable_projects: runQL – Multiplayer data explorer for analysts

credibility_indicators: Senior PM at Google leading serverless developer products
Board Chair of TalentLift Canada, impactful humanitarian initiative
Strong technical and product leadership experience
potential_red_flags: Frequent role changes in startups could raise questions about long-term stability, but consistent focus on innovation offsets this.
person_analysis.overview: Kris Braun is a Canadian tech product creator and engineering leader with over two decades of experience spanning startups and big tech. Currently CTO of runQL, he is also the founder of Plot, and previously served as Senior Product Manager at Google and VP Engineering at Bonfire Interactive. Known for his zero-to-one product building philosophy, Kris has deep hands-on technical experience (React, Node, LLMs, PostgreSQL, firmware) combined with organizational leadership. Beyond tech, he is Board Chair of TalentLift Canada, helping refugees relocate into Canadian jobs, reflecting his commitment to humanitarian innovation.
person_analysis.executive_summary: Kris Braun is a Waterloo-based product creator and CTO with a track record of building and scaling impactful products at startups and Google. With expertise in full-stack engineering, serverless platforms, and AI-driven workflows, he has led teams through growth and transformation. His leadership extends into humanitarian work as Board Chair of TalentLift Canada, blending tech with social impact.
key_insights: Strong zero-to-one product creator across multiple startups.
Proven big tech impact at Google with Workflows adoption.
Deeply involved in humanitarian initiatives via TalentLift.
Blends technical hands-on expertise with leadership and product strategy.
